pl.polsl.lab6.pawel.salicki.servlet

Class AddNewMatchSecond

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • pl.polsl.lab6.pawel.salicki.servlet.AddNewMatchSecond
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(urlPatterns="/AddNewMatchSecond")
public class AddNewMatchSecond
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet saves match information to the database. Servlet obtains information with the help of the AddNewMatch servlet. Servlet adds a new match to the JPA database.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Salicki
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addGuestPlayer

        private void addGuestPlayer(java.lang.String playerGuestName,
                            int playerGuestGoals,
                            int playerGuestEnteredMinute,
                            int playerGuestLeftMinute,
                            int playerGuestYellowCards,
                            int playerGuestFouls,
                            int matchLength,
                            int playerGuestRedCards)
        The method connects to WebService and adds the player to the database.
        Parameters:
        playerGuestName - name of guest player
        playerGuestGoals - amount of scored goals by guest player
        playerGuestEnteredMinute - minute that guest player entered on the field
        playerGuestLeftMinute - minute that guest player left from the field
        playerGuestYellowCards - amount of yellow cards collected by guest player
        playerGuestFouls - amount of fouls
        matchLength - length of player on the field
        playerGuestRedCards - did the player get a red card
